tickets.name: Early Bird Ticket

suggestion.description: Discover the latest and greatest art pieces from around the world at this annual art exhibition.

tickets.name: General Admission

suggestion.name: Frequency Summer Festival

category.name: Music Festivals
category.description: Events that feature multiple musical performers.

tickets.name: General Admission

tickets.name: VIP Admission

suggestion.name: Charity Gala Dinner
suggestion.description: Join us for an elegant evening of fine dining, entertainment, and charity!
suggestion.location: Grand Ballroom, The Ritz-Carlton, San Francisco

category.name: Galas
category.description: Events that involve an evening of entertainment, often for charity or fundraising purposes.

tickets.name: Individual Ticket
tickets.description: Access to the gala dinner for one person.

tickets.name: Table of 10
tickets.description: Reserved table for 10 people at the gala dinner.
